section.title: What is SuperTux?
section.p: SuperTux is a classic 2D jump'n run sidescroller game in a style similar to the original Super Mario games covered under the GPL. The Milestone 1 release of SuperTux features:
Together with a little story, we hope to provide a good gaming experience with this first Milestone release.
SuperTux is available for Windows, Linux, MacOSX as well as numerous other more exotic systems.
